topic.title: Editing a Domain's Contact Information
topic.p: You can edit a domain's contact information using this feature.

ol.title: To edit a domain's contact information:

li.p: In the Domain Management menu group, click Domain List (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.

ol.li: Click properties for the domain you want to edit. The Properties window for the selected domain appears.
Next to Domain Setup, click Edit. The Edit Domain Setup window for the selected domain appears.
Edit the settings you want to change.
When you are finished editing, click Save. A message appears informing you that the information has been changed.
